name: Star Trek: Klingon Academy
description:
Star Trek: Klingon Academy is a simulation game developed by 14 Degrees East. It came out on 21-06-2000. Interplay Productions published the game. Star Trek: Klingon Academy has a Metascore of 74, based on professional reviews.
Star Trek: Klingon Academy is available on PC.
Raphael Hernandez produced the game. It was scored by Inon Zur and Rick Jackson.
